LanguageData.FF_AntidepressantHigh.label: antidepressant
LanguageData.FF_AntidepressantHigh.description: Antidepressant in the bloodstream. Increases neurotransmitter activity in the brain, generating a mild euphoric effect.
LanguageData.FF_EctostasisHigh.label: ectostasis
LanguageData.FF_EctostasisHigh.description: Active ectostasis mechanites in the body. They maintain the body's metabolism at baseline levels.
LanguageData.FF_FibrodustHigh.label: fibrodust clotting
LanguageData.FF_FibrodustHigh.description: Fibrodust in the bloodstream. Active bleeding is temporarily halted by its strong coagulant effects.
LanguageData.FF_NeodermHigh.label: neoderm
LanguageData.FF_NeodermHigh.description: Neoderm on the skin. It heals dermal scars over time through a mildly painful process.
LanguageData.FF_OverclockHigh.label: overclock
LanguageData.FF_OverclockHigh.description: Active overclock in the bloodstream. It boosts the body's metabolism into overdrive, burning energy to increase movespeed and productivity.
LanguageData.FF_OverclockHigh.stages.0.label: silent
LanguageData.FF_OverclockHigh.stages.1.label: active
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerHigh.label: painkiller high
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerHigh.description: Painkiller in the bloodstream. It dulls sensation and relieves pain.
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerHigh.stages.0.label: mild
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerHigh.stages.1.label: moderate
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerHigh.stages.2.label: strong
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerTolerance.label: painkiller tolerance
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to painkiller. The more severe this tolerance is, the more painkiller it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerAddiction.label: painkiller dependence
LanguageData.FF_PainkillerAddiction.stages.0.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.FF_ScytheHigh.label: scythe coma
LanguageData.FF_ScytheHigh.description: A form of benign coma during which the body recovers from a drastically overstimulated immune system.
LanguageData.FF_SorrowHigh.label: high on sorrow
LanguageData.FF_SorrowHigh.description: Sorrow in the bloodstream. It produces a controlled upwelling of sadness with cathartic effects.
